data.name: 7Days Origins Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment.
Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test.
Everything depends on your choice.
You only have 7 days!
And what would be your choice?
data.about_the_game:
This is a place for those who gather to receive a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity in the structure of time. Members sometimes become friends, and sometimes turn out to be enemies in order to finish their own assignment.
Kirel, our amnesiac protagonist who has forgotten even his own name is put on a test.
Everything depends on your choice.
You only have 7 days!
And what would be your choice?
data.short_description: Every choice you make will change your story. Every small choice will change your relationships with comrades, and change your fate and those of your comrades at critical moments. You may be the villain, or a trustworthy comrade. Everything depends on your choices.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
